name: Project-Chiarasaber
description:
PROJECT-CHIARASABER

IT'S a 2d mobile version of the famous VR game BEAT SABER, the game is made because my girlfriend Chiara asked for a game based on her so.......here we are!

NEW FEATURES COMING SOON SUCH AS:

-New songs

-Customization

-Option for audio and graphics

-Apk downloadable version for android devices (android 6 or above)
